com.example.kit

Class ItemListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.kit.ItemListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataChangedCallback, MakeChipGroup.OnMakeChipCloseListener, TagChipGroup.OnTagChipCloseListener

    public class ItemListController
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataChangedCallback, TagChipGroup.OnTagChipCloseListener, MakeChipGroup.OnMakeChipCloseListener
    Controller that handles data management and manipulation for a ItemListFragment.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ItemListController.ItemSetValueChangedCallback
      Interface to register a callback when the value of the ItemSet changes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemListController()
      Initializes the ItemSet and attaches the controller as a DataChangedCallback for the ItemDataSource.

      • setCallback

        public void setCallback(ItemListController.ItemSetValueChangedCallback callback)
        Registers a callback to be called when the data set changes. Calls the callback method for the initial value.
        Parameters:
        callback - The ItemListController.ItemSetValueChangedCallback to be registered.

      • deleteCheckedItems

        Returns:

      • onDataChanged

        public void onDataChanged()
        Callback method for the DataChangedCallback called whenever the data from the DataSource changes. Updates the ItemSet and adapter. Relays the call to the ItemListController.ItemSetValueChangedCallback as the data changed likely means the total value has changed too.
        Specified by:
        onDataChanged in interface DataChangedCallback
